web.login.secure_link_helper.text: A secure link will be sent to your email inbox.

web.auth.verify.success.text: Your account has been verified successfully

web.auth.verify.expired_key.text: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.

web.auth.verify.already_verified.text: This account has already been verified. You can sign in now.

web.auth.verify.unable_to_verify.text: Unable to verify account. Please try again or contact support.

web.auth.verify.check_email.text: Please check your email for a verification link

web.auth.verify.error.text: Account verification failed. Please check your verification link or request a new one.

web.auth.verify.check_email_help.text: Check your email for the most recent verification link

web.auth.verify.check_spam.text: Check your spam/junk folder if you can't find the email

web.auth.verify.contact_support.text: Contact support if you continue to have issues

web.auth.verify.missing_key_message.text: Please use the verification link sent to your email address to verify your account.

web.auth.change_password.success.text: Your password has been changed successfully

web.auth.change_password.error.text: Password change failed. Please verify your current password and try again.

web.auth.close_account.warning.text: This action cannot be undone. All your secrets will be permanently deleted.

web.auth.close_account.confirm.text: I understand this action is permanent

web.auth.password_reset_request.descript.text: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password

web.auth.password_reset.title.context: Password reset request flow - user requests a reset link

web.auth.password_reset.description.text: Please enter your new password below. Make sure it's strong and unique to protect your account.

web.auth.passwordReset.emailSent.text: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset the password for your account

web.help.check_spam_folder.text: Check your spam or junk folder

web.help.check_email_spelling.text: Verify you entered your email address correctly

web.help.wait_few_minutes.text: Wait a few minutes - emails can sometimes be delayed

web.help.try_again.text: Try requesting a new link if it's been more than 10 minutes

web.help.use_magic_link_instead.text: Use the Magic Link option to sign in without a password. Once signed in, you can change your password in Account Settings.

web.help.account_locked_explanation.text: After multiple failed sign-in attempts, accounts are temporarily locked for security. Wait 15 minutes and try again, or use Magic Link to sign in.

web.help.contact_us_description.text: If you're still having trouble, we're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
